title: Hallucination Detection for LLM-based Text-to-SQL Generation via Two-Stage Metamorphic Testing
summary: In Text-to-SQL generation, large language models (LLMs) have shown strong generalization and adaptability. However, LLMs sometimes generate hallucinations, i.e.,unrealistic or illogical content, which leads to incorrect SQL queries and negatively impacts downstream applications. Detecting these hallucinations is particularly challenging.
